idea-plugin.name: Copy & Browse as Github Path
idea-plugin.description:
For projects with git repos in the base, it allows you to copy the current file's path on master, and open that with the default browser.
Handy when you want to quickly navigate to a file in Intellij and then copy the Github link (including line number) to share with someone else as a URL.

action.description: Copy and open the URL to this file in Github, assuming the master branch
